select
userId, userPwd, userName, userPhoneNumber, userEmail, userJoinDate, userVerify, userBirth
from MemberDTO
where userId like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where userName like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where userVerify like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by userVerify desc limit #{displayTotalContent} , #{pageContent}

select count(*) from MemberDTO
where userId like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where userName like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where userVerify like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')

select
product.pno, pft.storedFileRootName, cno, product_name, product_price, product_stock, product_description, product_regDate, userId
from ProductDTO as product left outer join ProductFileDTO as pft on product.pno = pft.pno
where userId like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where product_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where cno between #{keyword} and #{keyword} + 100
order by product_name limit #{displayTotalContent} , #{pageContent}

select count(*) from ProductDTO
where userId like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where product_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where cno between #{keyword} and #{keyword} + 100
